Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific worker to a specific task

Name: select_feature_for_sprint
Description: Binary decision to include a specific feature in the next sprint

Name: prioritize_feature
Description: Integer priority level assigned to a feature (e.g.

Name: allocate_budget_to_feature
Description: Amount of budget allocated to develop a specific feature

Name: team_size
Description: Number of workers assigned to a team

Name: sprint_velocity_target
Description: The target story points to be completed in a sprint

Name: task_start_day
Description: The day within a sprint a task is scheduled to start

Name: worker_utilization
Description: The percentage of a worker's capacity allocated to tasks
